metadata.title: CVE-2016-1000341 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Bouncy Castle JCE Provider version 1.55 and earlier DSA signaturegeneration is vulnerable to timing attack. Where timings can be closelyobserved for the generation of signatures, the lack of blinding in 1.55, orearlier, may allow an attacker to gain information about the signature's kvalue and ultimately the private value as well.

criterions.comment: bouncycastle package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
